post.body: heading home everyone! g'night
It's cold, cold, cold! trying to work with frozen toes...
woke up to a blanket of snow... and sunshine... God is good!
burrrr.... it's freezing... It's going to be a cold day off
well folks, I'm heading home. Great day of strategy planning with God's Word, God's dreams, Gods coffee... Heading home to be with the fam
back from lunch.. working on articulating Journey's "core value"... I think I'll make a pot of coffee. :-)
heading to lunch with Jordon... should be fun!! pray for me.
here we go...
staff spending time in God's Word...
heading home... country road...
heading to the bucks for my afternoon coffee... thank you Jesus!
back from lunch.... work work work... whatever that means
heading to lunch with the fam... Hawaiian food, I wish I was there!

http://www.iamsecond.com
wow!
sleep sucked last night... But God is good... thank you Jesus for bean juice!
going to bed... can't wait for sleep... and a productive day tomorrow
heading home... I love my family!
half way through the day... do I need coffee??
d'oh, it's Tuesday already! lots of catch up today...
Beautiful Monday... Sunny! God is good.... Journey was amazing last night.... thank you Jesus.... thank you Church!
thank you Jesus for Sunshine!!! woo hooo... keep it coming Lord!
g'night friends... I'm going to bed dreaming of the cold/snow/freezing/ice will go away...
long monday... wife and I have been trying to find her a phone... her phone was stolen at church!! But our God is GOOD!
I can't wait for Journey tonight! the Holy Spirit is speaking to my heart!!! wow... I hope to see you tonight...
more snow... more church... today's a day birthday's too... shout out to my daughter Makenna, friends Ian and Roni - HAPPY BIRTHDAY!
chaos in the Kirkpatrick home... getting ready for my daughter's birthday party....
full day with the kids... now they are both taking a nap... how does my wife do this (day in and day out)... she's amazing!
it won't stop snowing!!!! ug!
journal time while there's a blizzard outside...
going to bed... g'night
taken the ol' lady out for a well deserved date... don't tell her I call her old... or lady...
heading in to a staff meeting
missed the trash truck this morning! ug!
heading to starbucks to meet with my boss... :-)
It can't get any colder in Bend... thank God for hot coffee and warm hearts...
